get.description:
This Resource describes a streetlight.
The Property "value" is a boolean.
A value of 'true' means that the streetlight is on.
A value of 'false' means that the streetlight is off.

value.description: The on/off status of the streetlight.

alternateName.description: An alternative name for this item.

areaServed.description: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.

circuit.description: The circuit  which this streetlight connects to and gets power from. Typically it will contain and identifier that will allow it to obtain more information about such circuit

controllingMethod.description: The method used to control this streetlight. Enum: 'group, individual'.

current.description: Current value of the streetlight corresponding to this observation.

dataProvider.description: A sequience of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

dateCreated.description: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

dateLastLampChange.description: Timestamp of the  last change of lamp made.

dateLastSwitchingOff.description: Timestamp of the last switching off.

dateLastSwitchingOn.description: Timestamp of the last switching on.

dateModified.description: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

dateServiceStarted.description: Date at which the streetlight started giving service.

description.description: The A description of this item.

feederPillarNum.description: Streetlight feeder pillar information associated with the streetlight corresponding to this observation.

illuminanceLevel.description: Relative illuminance level setting. A number between 0 and 1.

image.description: A URL containing a photo of the streetlight.

lanternHeight.description: Lantern's height. In columns with many arms this can vary between streetlights. Another variation source of this property are wall-mounted streetlights.

locationCategory.description: Category of the location where the streetlight is placed. Enum: 'bridge, centralIsland facade, garden, park, parking, pedestrianPath, playground, road, sidewalk, tunnel'.

powerConsumption.description: Power consumed by the LED or the streetlight bulb corresponding to this observation.

powerFactor.description: Power factor or the ratio of working power of the streetlight corresponding to this observation.

powerRating.description: Power rating of the LED or the streetlight bulb corresponding to this observation.

powerState.description: Streetlight's power state. Enum: 'bootingUp, low, off, on'.

source.description: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source providor, or the URL to the source object

status.description: The overall status of this streetlight. Enum: 'brokenLantern, columnIssue, defectiveLamp, ok'.

streetPoleNum.description: Street pole information associated with the streetlight corresponding to this observation.

type.description: NGSI Entity type. It has to be Streetlight.

voltage.description: Voltage value of the streetlight corresponding to this observation.

if.description: The OCF Interface set supported by this Resource.
